alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Christian and western Greene Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Billings, or near Republic, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Republic, Battlefield, Willard, Ash Grove, Billings, Brookline, Glidewell, Cave Springs, Ebenezer and Bois D`arc. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
